website_summaries.verdict: A subtle globe pendant light you can add to any space for great effect. Provides plenty of illumination in larger spaces.
pros: Good, uniform light coverage for a variety of room sizes
Easy to set up and install using the included mounting hardware
cons: Lacks a unique design that stands out in a room

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Glass ball does not attach securely. Ball seems too heavy for the metal clips that hold this on. Very concerned it will fall in an earthquake. I have this on a tall stairwell and paid hundreds to have an electrician install. Very disappointed. Save yourself headache and money. Don’t buy. Ps customer service has not been helpful. I keep asking for support and they point me to an installation video. I have followed it precisely.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Difficult globe attachment
customer_reviews.text: The glass globe cover (not talking about electrical box 'canopy') attaches to globe with 3 spring steel fingers that have some vinyl slipped over them to protect glass. Very difficult to install this cover. The concept isn't hard to understand, I just wouldn't recommend someone with smaller sized hands attempt on their own. While it's perhaps safer & easier to install by attaching glass globe last after making electrical connections, for some it might be better to test installing glass globe on the ground first.
customer_reviews.author: reviewers name

customer_reviews.title: Nice Diffused Light. Very Appropriate for Mid-Century Homes.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Diffused Light. Very Appropriate for Mid-Century Homes. The design may not be as avant-garde as some people may like, but I got this because it diffuses bright LED light bulbs. The in-fashion clear fixtures have too much glare for me. Pros: 1) Easy to install. 2) Quality construction, no defects. 3) Simple and functional design. Cons: 1) Screws on fixture can be challenging to remove to change light bulb. One needs a very short screwdriver. 2) The bulb needs to be higher wattage because of the frosted diffusion of light.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: The fixture is fine and, in my opinion, very good looking. But, it is very difficult to change the bulb. There is a video on YouTube telling how to do it. You should view it before trying to change the bulb. If you do it the way that might be intuitive to you, you risk breaking the globe and injuring yourself. Ask me how I know.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Holberg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this white glass globe pendant light. It looks amazing in our hallway which has high ceilings. But the best part about this is, When the fixture was being put up our son broke the glass globe. Ugggggg..........I contacted company to see if we could purchase just the globe. This Awesome company replaced the whole light fixture free of charge. Now that is a company that stands behind there customers!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Drain

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are very happy with this light. We wanted something simple and with a bit of mid century modern design. We found it in this light and are delighted with it. Nice design and a very good value for the money! Highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark White

customer_reviews.title: Looks like better quality than expected, I think we'll love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for diffuse light in an art studio, and I think it's also going to look amazing - excited to see it up. It feels like it's well made, shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Artist

customer_reviews.title: This product was shipped promptly. It was packaged properly ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped promptly. It was packaged properly and arrived with no damage. It is as we expected. We bought it to match existing lighting fixtures in hallways and it blends in perfectly well. We did the installation ourselves which required only moderate effort.
customer_reviews.author: LGA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mod Light Fixture
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Looks chic and high-quality for a very affordable price. Love the mod vibes of this fixture. The only issues were that the screws it came with were not long enough to install in my ceiling- we got new ones at Home depot for $1 so not a big deal. This also does NOT come with a bulb so be sure to install that before you install the fixture. It's not easy to change the bulb on this fixture. I'd definitely recommend having an electrician install.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: POOR CONSTRUCTION + DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: It is IMPOSSIBLE to change the bulb. The globe is paper-thin, and is held to the socket by a powerful internal spring mechanism. We bought a pair of these for a long hallway: when the professional electrician (hired through Amazon) installed, the globe broke in his hands like an eggshell, so we had to 1) replace the lamp 2) re-hire the electrician and 3) the globe broke AGAIN. We are now removing both fixtures and replacing with a better quality. DO YOURSELVES A FAVOR AND DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Changing the bulb might be a little tricky the way that it is designed. For that I give it 4 stars. The glass orb is held by 3 screws that you have to loosen and tighten on the top inside of a ring. Besides being hard to get to on a ladder, I would be concerned about over tightening the screws and damaging the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture! It gives a beautiful glow and the light is softly dispersed. There is no "hot spot" where the bulb is and it looks like the moon. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and light up your life!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures show the difference in our front entryway! We love the fact that it not only lights up the area but it is a natural daylight. I turn it on in the morning and dim it in the evening. The affect is wonderful. The globe is so sturdy and with an led light bulb inside we won’t have to change it for many years! It is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Cool light.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool light. We bought this for our son's bedroom. My husband painted it with glow in the dark paint and we put glow in the dark stars over my son's ceiling looks very cool the light looks like the moon.
customer_reviews.author: Andersen Family

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product back in February and it was in a closed for several months before we installed it last week only to find that it was cracked and not usable. Since we ordered so long ago, no option to return was available and this product is no longer available. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hanging wire is not pure white. It has print on it.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I just couldn’t stand the black print of wire specs on the hanging wire. It’s all over the wire and it’s so visible when you hang the light. It makes the product looks unfinished. Wonder why no one mentions this on the reviews. The product would be good if it comes with pure white wire with nothing printed on it.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Ting Tseng

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty easy install. We had to make some modifications to our light box because of the design of the bracket bit once we did that, it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Hantan

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and simple
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 14" to hang over our kitchen table. It's very easy to install and super cool on a dimmer switch. I absolutely love it. The packaging was very well done to insure that the sphere did not break.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: MLM Lighting
customer_reviews.text: such a great price & a terrific update to horrible apartment lighting. purchased a dimmer switch plate and it’s great mood lighting.MLM style♥️
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: They look great.
customer_reviews.text: Installed 3 in my living room. They all run Phillip hue color light bulbs. They look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan f.

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: We found everything but the mounting bracket. Maybe we lost it after opening the box. I had to install this lamp onto the electrical box using the screws instead of the decorative screws which you provided. Job completed and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RUDY HILTON

customer_reviews.title: Get another brand...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Difficult to get the globe inside and I have no clue how I’ll change the light bulb without breaking the glass globe. The glass is cheap and you can see some lines on it from manufacturers, translucent enough that you can see the clippings holding the globe from the cable. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boris I Araya

customer_reviews.title: looks really nice. good size
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure which size I wanted. I'm glad I went with this size, it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: This light fixture is perfect. Looks up to date and classy
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is perfect. Looks up to date and classy. Just the right size and my husband installed without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Julie T

customer_reviews.title: Great light at a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: Great light. The glass is a heavier grade than what I would have imagined for the price. Very happy with this purchase and it worked perfectly in the way I had intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery K.

customer_reviews.title: But this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOOVE this light. The price was phenomenal & the quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these but ended up only keeping one. One arrived shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Esthetician

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Grear service, Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. I replaced 2 recessed lights with these (of course I had to purchase conversion kits but that's a given). BTW, great service after the sale.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I broke a light in the hallway and couldn’t find a matching replacement so I replaced all three. The lights arrived as promised and installed as expected and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit Reinders

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good looking. Takes some time to install for a novice, but doable.
customer_reviews.author: N. Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Globe
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be just light globe... it was the hold light fixture
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Well made, heavy
customer_reviews.text: These blinds appear to be well made and installed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Mchugh

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed product.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install the globe without the fear of it shattering the glass. There are about $10 worth of parts here. The globe doesn't seal properly. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M Colling

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great hanging in our breakfast ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great hanging in our breakfast nook. I loved its clean look so much I ordered another one for our master bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light is working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice mid century modern feel. I like how it looks
customer_reviews.author: Monica M

customer_reviews.title: Hangs evenly!!
customer_reviews.text: Hangs evenly.. I have had bad luck with cheaper lights not hanging straight. Its a simple but beautiful light! I am using it as a patio light..so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: leeann nelson

customer_reviews.title: Laundry Room
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting, easy to install, easy to clean.....What a buy!
customer_reviews.author: gilbertm

customer_reviews.title: Blemish
customer_reviews.text: Our pendant had a noticable blemish on the frosted glass. Also the light bulb installation was completely different than the video suggested!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cox

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light! The manufacturer could have made installing the globe to the pendent easier.
customer_reviews.author: Blakers

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware, need partial refund
customer_reviews.text: Missing all the hardware.. had to go get it at the shop to install. Would not recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: lionel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Really looks good for the price. It’s tricky to replace the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 💯👍🏾Amazing... Thanks a trillion... ...
customer_reviews.text: 💯👍🏾Amazing... Thanks a trillion...❤️❤️Love them ..Had them installed in my kitchen...🙏🏾💯
customer_reviews.author: ms. glen

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Quality materials. Love that the cord is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Y

product_meta.title: Kira Home Ceres 8" Mid-Century Modern Hanging Orb Pendant Light with Smooth Matte White Frosted Diffuser, White Finish
product_meta.description:
Color:White, 8"

The Ceres 8" hanging light features an astonishingly smooth, matte white finish. The unique, perfectly spherical design allows light to be emitted in all directions. Paired with an adjustable hanging length, this fixture adds a perfect modern touch to any kitchen, dining room, or restaurant. Unlike our competitors, Ceres is UL listed for your safety.

 * Prop 65 Warning: Yes
 * Prop 65 Harm: cancer, birth defects, and/or other reproductive harms
 * Prop 65 Chemicals: Lead
 * Safety Rating: UL Listed
 * Lighting Direction: Up/Down Light
 * Lighting Source Type: Incandescent, LED, CFL
feature_bullets: MODERN STYLE: Pendant light featuring a matte white glass globe shade that hangs at your desired length with an adjustable wire. This 8" perfectly spherical pendant light will illuminate your space with evenly diffused light and enhance your decor

ELEVATE YOUR HOME: Mount this simple, easy-to-install fixture in multiple areas such as above kitchen or dining room tables, in sets of 2-3 over kitchen islands or in hospitality settings such as a restaurant or bar. Dimmer and sloped ceiling compatible
UL LISTED FOR YOUR SAFETY: UL listed for dry locations. Uses (1) LED, CFL, or up to 60W traditional incandescent medium base bulb. Bulb sold separately
DIMENSIONS: Shade: 7.25" (H) x 8" (D), Canopy: 5.75" (D) x 1" (H). Includes 61.5" of adjustable wire for desired hanging height. Minimum/Maximum hanging height: 10"- 71.5"

UNMATCHED QUALITY AND CUSTOMER CARE: Designed and supported in California. Quality, innovation, and attractive products are our motto. We provide a 1-year warranty when purchased from an authorized dealer. Shop with confidence!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
